title: Allow to add more root nodes in element tree - feature request
author: vmario89
body_snippet:
Hi, at the current moment mRemoteNG only allows one local connection file in the connection tree which i can import/export/load ("Tools & Connection Stack" in my example):

![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5631071/38036493-1adea3f4-32a7-11e8-8ec4-48e6e31fa368.png)

Because i have different things in my mRemote i like to be able to change only partial things in my connection tree. I mean to **split** the folders and connections into different root nodes like this:
![grafik...
